attributes.action: Get rid of all the stones on Southend beach and replace it with just sand
attributes.background: Southend beach is covered in just stones. And its not fair on the children that want to play on the sand. They only have stones. Get rid of the stones and replace it with sand. It hurts everyone feet to walk on the stones

rejection.details: Maintenance of local beaches is a matter for the owner or relevant local authority, not the Government or House of Commons.
